import { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { checkReaction } from '../services/reaction.service' import { UserContext } from '../contexts/UserContext' import '../styles/postcard.css' export default function PostMusicCard({ card }) { const {_id, name, author, file, albumCover } = card const domain = process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_SERVICE const albumFolderRef = useRef(`${domain}/musics/${file.split(".")[0]}`) function playAudio() { const audio = new Audio(`${albumFolderRef.current}/${file}`) audio.play() } return (
{ (albumCover !== "") ?
:
}

{name}

{author}

favorite 0
0
download
) }
